name: Mystic Arcanum
effects: you gain a Mystic Arcanum: choose one level 6 Warlock spell
you can cast your arcanum spell once without expending a spell slot
at Warlock levels 13, 15, and 17, you gain additional arcanum spells of levels 7, 8, and 9 respectively
whenever you gain a Warlock level, you can replace one of your arcanum spells with another Warlock spell of the same level
limits: you regain all Mystic Arcanum uses when you finish a long rest
notes: Each arcanum spell is a 1/long rest free cast.
